trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_01<tab>Well met, friend. I am in charge of storing property lost during the Calamity.
TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_Q1<tab>Are you here to reclaim your belongings?

TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_05<tab>Countless souls went missing during the Calamity, and a veritable mountain of articles was left ownerless. The Adventurers' Guild has been holding such articles in safekeeping in hopes that their owners will one day reclaim them.

TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_06<tab>Please be warned, however, that we are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> a storage service. The items you retrieve become your sole responsibility, and cannot be returned to us under any circumstance.
TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_10<tab>Fewer folk come forward to reclaim their belongings with each passing day.
TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_11<tab>It saddens me to think that some items will remain in our safekeeping forever, their owners never to return.
